sentences.sentence: If he had remained among the larches all night, he would have heard nothing of the stir at the Grange.
sentences.translation: 如果他整夜都待在落叶松的树林中，他就听不到田庄里的骚动。

sentences.sentence: Most larches have brittle branches and produce relatively few flowers on lower branches.
sentences.translation: 大多数落叶松具有脆弱的枝条，并且下部枝条开花较少。

sentences.sentence: If he had remained among the larches all night, he would have heard nothing of the stir at the Grange; unless, perhaps, he might catch the gallop of the messenger going to Gimmerton.
sentences.translation: 如果他整夜都待在落叶松的树林中，他就听不到田庄里的骚动；除非，也许他会听到送信人到吉默吞去的马蹄疾驰声。
